dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 74 samples for training and 15 for testing, each sample includes three LDR images captured at different exposure values and a corresponding HDR ground-truth image.
dcterms:title: Kalantari et al. dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset used for qualitative comparisons in HDR reconstruction, consisting of dynamic scenes without ground-truth HDR images.
dcterms:title: Sen et al. dataset
